Armor_powers_stat_upgrades.title: Armors Skill tree
Armor_powers_stat_upgrades.description: This is the skill tree that will allow you to unlock your various Iron man armors

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 1
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 10
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 1
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 10
last_tick_commands: execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.superior.color 0
execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 8

execute as @s[tag=mark.50.superior] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.flame 8
